name: plus
description: Support TaylorBot and get exclusive perks for you and your server

options.name: show
options.description: Get basic information about your TaylorBot Plus membership

options.name: add
options.description: Add this server to your TaylorBot Plus servers, giving it access to exclusive perks

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove this server from your TaylorBot Plus servers, losing access to exclusive perks
